description: Your all-in-one suite of SEO essentials.
content: B By: Brent Payne December 18, 2007 SEOmoz Free Premium Membership: A How to Guide Moz News I received a rather exciting private message from Rand recently. In it he stated I was going to receive free premium membership.How did it happen? Thumbs baby! Thumbs!!Huh? What the hell are you talking about now Payne? How do thumbs get me free premium membership? Well, if you click on the 'anti-paid links crusade and now the subdomain vs. subdirectory debate going on. He's trying to make the world a ... Read this post J By: Jeff Pollard November 29, 2007 The Launch of Private Messaging on SEOmoz Moz News Today I'm pleased to announce the release of Private Messaging here at SEOmoz. Starting now, you'll be able to private message other users using the sexy "Private Message This User" butto... Read this post By: Rand Fishkin November 27, 2007 50 Perfect Gifts for Webophiles, Bloggers, & Internet Marketers Moz News With Cyber Monday just wrapping up, it's time to start for all of us procrastinators to get to work finding the perfect gifts for the geeks in our lives. Luckily, Mystery Guest and I have been doing some browsing around this year, and figured we'd share our favorites from around the web. Frankly, I've been really disappointed with the standard geek gift guides from places like Engadget and Amazon, ... Read this post By: Rand Fishkin November 18, 2007 SEOmoz's Venture Capital Deal Closes + Financials for Jan-Nov 2007 Moz News Today marks the completion of our first ever external funding - $1.1million (sorry, no Shoemoney shot here). I wrote about this move twice before, asking in August for your feedback on whether to take venture capital and in September about ... Read this post S By: SeanMaguire November 14, 2007 Top Ten Responses to the Top Ten Pickup Lines from SEOs Moz News Please forgive me for submitting two posts so close to each other, however considering the urgency of the situation, I simply couldn't wait. Marriages may be at stake. Several months back, one of the members (Nathania Johnson) posted an article entitled “Top Ten Pickup Lines for SEO’... Read this post By: Rebecca Kelley November 14, 2007 Help Us Brainstorm Fun Job Titles Moz News Hello, devoted Mozbers out there (Moz + Members). We're currently in the process of redesigning our business cards, and we want some amusing, fun, not at all corporate or stuffy-sounding job titles. Rand, Gillian, and the programmers are all pretty set with their creative titles, but Scott, Jane, Sarah, the future admin, and I all need your help. We need suggestions for awesomely bodacious and rad... Read this post C By: Christian Maund-Anderson November 13, 2007 Living in an SEO World Moz News Living in an SEO world can be strange at times; forget about the internal politics of black hats, white hats, and no hats, I'm talking about being on the inside looking out, an SEO Professional in a corporate environment, professional title: Link Developer. I can't say I'm getting used to it, but I have always taken this question in stride, "What do you do …exa... Read this post O By: OliverTaco November 12, 2007 Things You Learn When You Get Mad Moz News It was a hectic week - all the normal kid stuff (soccer, parties, trip to the emergency room), all the normal work stuff (regular business, this new thing we're working on), a date with the wife (her turn to pick a movie - total chick flick, no car chase scenes), etc, etc.And then on Friday night I had a problem with ShutterFly, went to bed mad, woke up mad, wrote a sarcastic blog po... Read this post By: Rand Fishkin November 11, 2007 Re-Ranking the SEO Blogosphere (and My Updated Firefox Sidebar) Moz News Over the last few weeks, I've realized that I really need to optimize my processes for working. It's been a long, steady slog, but I've finally got at least one item nailed down, and since it was so popular last time, I figured I'd once again share my Firefox Sidebar. Of course, this means I'm also re-ranking the blogs that I read, trimming many off the list and adding a great number of new one... Read this post J By: Jeff Pollard November 8, 2007 Introducing the SEOmoz SEO Services Marketplace Moz News I'm pleased to announce that after many hours of work and testing by SEOmoz, our beta testers and yourself truly, the SEOmoz SEO Services Marketplace is officially launched! Th... Read this post By: Rebecca Kelley November 7, 2007 Just Another Day at the Office Moz News Want to know what a typical day at the SEOmoz office looks like? How's about I give you a sneak peek? Here's a day in the life of an SEOmozzer, from start to finish... 7:15 am: Wake up 7:45 am: Head to gym 8:00-9:00 am: Work out 9:00-10:00 am: Drive home, shower, get ready for work 10:15 am: Get to office 10:20 am: Have a bagel (Blueberry....
